details:
* [CVE-2014-3668](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2014-3668)
Fix bug #68027 - fix date parsing in XMLRPC lib
* [CVE-2014-3669](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2014-3669)
Fix bug #68044: Integer overflow in unserialize() (32-bits only)
* [CVE-2014-3670](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2014-3670)
Fix bug #68113 (Heap corruption in exif\_thumbnail())
* [CVE-2014-3710](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2014-3710)
Fix bug #68283: fileinfo: out-of-bounds read in elf note headers


Additional bugfix


Fix null byte handling in LDAP bindings in ldap-fix.patch


For Debian 6 Squeeze, these issues have been fixed in php5 version 5.3.3-7+squeeze23
